information.name: emprs
information.query: select count(*) as total, sum(if(empr_date_expiration<CURDATE(),1,0)) as expired from empr

information.name: prets
information.query: select count(*) as total, sum(if(pret_retour<CURDATE(),1,0)) as late from pret

information.name: resas
information.query: select sum(resa_confirmee) as confirmee, sum(if(resa_confirmee=0,1,0)) as a_valider from resa
